level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to set forth rules and applicable regulations related to the Office of the Mayor.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is section 422 of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act of 1973, as amended, Pub. L. No. 93-198, 87 Stat. 790 (codified at D.C. Code ยง 1-242 (1999 Repl.)).
